name: Suspect2
transcript:
[ 0m0s409ms - 0m1s129ms ] Yo, what's up.
[ 0m1s129ms - 0m3s439ms ] This is JustVek Boot Two speaking.
[ 0m3s439ms - 0m5s69ms ] Like, uh, I did nothing, but, uh, I can tell you for sure.

name: suspect69
transcript: Yeah, what's up? This is Suspect 69. I'm really sussy.

name: suspect699
transcript: No, I don't want those uh like hard coded shit, man. Please give me this.

name: reallysussyspect
transcript: I'm um um I'm not guilty. Well, actually, if you if you view it from another angle, I am very guilty. But this doesn't really counts because I'm actually not guilty.

result.name: reallysussyspect
result.reason: Dude literally says “from another angle, I am very guilty.” That’s not even lowkey, that’s just a confession with extra steps.

result.name: suspect69
result.reason: Straight-up introduces themself as “really sussy.” If this was Among Us, they’d get ejected on the first meeting.

result.name: Suspect2
result.reason: Says they “did nothing,” sounds more like a confused side character than the final boss. Not clean, but not super incrim either.

result.name: suspect699
result.reason: Only ranting about not wanting hard-coded stuff. More mad at code than at people, so least murder-y vibe here.

result.summary: Most likely killer is reallysussyspect ‘cause they borderline admit it, then suspect69 for calling themselves sussy, then Suspect2, and last is suspect699 who just wants better software and probably not a body count.
